mapper.select: SELECT app_info.id AS id, softwareName, APKName,status,versionId, softwareSize, supportROM, interfaceLanguage, appInfo, logoPicPath, d1.valueName AS flatformName, d2.valueName AS statusName, downloads, a1.categoryName AS categoryLevel1Name, a2.categoryName AS categoryLevel2Name, a3.categoryName AS categoryLevel3Name, versionNo FROM app_info INNER JOIN data_dictionary AS d1 ON d1.valueId = flatformId AND d1.typeCode = 'APP_FLATFORM' INNER JOIN data_dictionary AS d2 ON d2.valueId = STATUS AND d2.typeCode= 'APP_STATUS' INNER JOIN app_category AS a1 ON categoryLevel1 = a1.id INNER JOIN app_category AS a2 ON categoryLevel2 = a2.id INNER JOIN app_category AS a3 ON categoryLevel3 = a3.id INNER JOIN app_version ON app_version.id=app_info.versionId WHERE app_info.id=#{id}

SELECT app_info.id as id, softwareName, APKName, supportROM, interfaceLanguage, softwareSize, downloads, d1.valueName AS flatformName, a1.categoryName AS categoryLevel1Name, a2.categoryName AS categoryLevel2Name, a3.categoryName AS categoryLevel3Name, d2.valueName AS statusName, appInfo,versionId logoPicPath,STATUS, versionId FROM app_info INNER JOIN data_dictionary AS d1 ON d1.valueId=app_info.flatformId AND d1.typeCode='APP_FLATFORM' INNER JOIN data_dictionary AS d2 ON d2.valueId = STATUS AND d2.typeCode = 'APP_STATUS' INNER JOIN app_category AS a1 ON a1.id=app_info.categoryLevel1 INNER JOIN app_category AS a2 ON a2.id=app_info.categoryLevel2 INNER JOIN app_category AS a3 ON a3.id=app_info.categoryLevel3 where app_info.id =#{id} and versionId=#{versionId}
